data.title: Census Tract 101, Joplin, Missouri
data.meta_description: Census Tract 101 is a Low-Income CommunityOpportunity Zone located in Joplin, Missouri. This 2.6 square milecensus tract has a population of approximately 3,600and is the only Opportunity Zone in Jasper County. The adjacent map shows […]
data.text: Disclosure: Kingsbury Media LLC dba OpportunityDb (we, us, our) does not endorse, nor do we offer any opinion on the merits of, any sponsor or the securities they might offer at our events and on our published content, including websites, podcasts, videos, email messages, and other related content (our “Platform”). However, we are a for-profit business that generates revenue from payment of fees by paid sponsorships and advertisement sales, including sponsors that pay us flat fees and CPM-based fees, in exchange for featuring sponsored businesses, products, services, and exempt securities offerings to accredited investors on our Platform. Sponsorship fees may influence the selection and frequency of promotional materials presented. Platform users should be aware of this compensation arrangement and should take it into consideration, among other factors, when using our Platform and evaluating sponsor presentations. All Platform users are urged to conduct their own due diligence and consult with their own professional advisors before making investment decisions. Neither we nor any of our affiliates or representatives have been compensated in securities or other forms of consideration from any sponsor, other than the aforementioned sponsorship fees.
